updates.message: The problem with Connexus should now be resolved. We apologize for the inconvenience caused and we thank you again for your patience. Please rest assured that system reliability is a top priority at Pearson, and we are making continuous improvements to make our systems better. Affected users were experiencing difficulty logging into Connexus. Only users accessing the service from the state of Texas, USA were affected.

We have found a solution to the problem affecting some users on Connexus, and a target resolution time has now been set. The solution should be applied on the 05th of May 2015 at 12:30 GMT. Please note that this time frame is an estimate and may change. Affected users are experiencing difficulty logging into Connexus. Only users accessing the service from the state of Texas, USA are affected.

We are now able to confirm that some users are currently experiencing issues with Connexus. We are working on a solution and we thank you for your patience. Affected users are experiencing difficulty logging into Connexus. Only users accessing the service from the state of Texas, USA are affected.
We have received reports of potential issues with Connexus. We are investigating and will provide an update shortly.

The problem with Connexus should now be resolved. We apologize for the inconvenience caused and we thank you again for your patience. Please rest assured that system reliability is a top priority at Pearson, and we are making continuous improvements to make our systems better. Affected users were experiencing difficulty logging into Connexus.

We have found a solution to the problem affecting most users on Connexus, and a target resolution time has now been set. The solution should be applied on the 01st of May 2015 at 22:45 GMT. Please note that this time frame is an estimate and may change. Affected users are experiencing difficulty logging into Connexus.

We are still working hard on resolving the issue that most users are currently experiencing on Connexus. We thank you for your continued patience. Affected users are experiencing difficulty logging into Connexus.

We are now able to confirm that most users are currently experiencing issues with Connexus. We are working on a solution and we thank you for your patience. Affected users are experiencing difficulty logging into Connexus.
We have received reports of potential issues with Connexus. We are investigating and will provide an update shortly.
